title: PyCon 2009: A better Python for the JVM
description:
A better Python for the JVM

Presented at PyCon 2009 by Tobias Ivarsson

At the last PyCon we announced that we were starting a project for
improving the Jython compiler. This year we will share the first fruits
of that work with the Python community!

[VIDEO HAS ISSUES: ambient mic left on; results in echoing audio]
